channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-5817] Fix uncategorized tests
item.description: Some tests are not categorized. They are not run if they are not categorized. I found the set of six or seven tests by running nkeywal's little ./dev-support/hbasetests.sh tool. This looks useful.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
These are the tests missing categorizations:


Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/TestMXBean.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/TestRSKilledWhenMasterInitializing.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/master/TestAssignmentManager.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/master/TestMXBean.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/master/TestMasterNoCluster.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/coprocessor/TestRowProcessorEndpoint.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/metrics/TestExponentiallyDecayingSample.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/metrics/TestMetricsHistogram.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/metrics/TestExactCounterMetric.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ipc/TestDelayedRpc.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ipc/TestPBOnWritableRpc.java

Index: src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/TestProcessBasedCluster.java

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12523079/categorization.txt
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 36 new or modified tests.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 6 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/1572//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/1572//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarnings.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/1572//console

This message is automatically generated.

Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #2784 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/2784/)
HBASE-5817 Fix uncategorized tests (Revision 1327691)

Result = FAILURE
